newsitem.title: ITALY: Preliminary Italy July CPI data due July 21, 22.
newsitem.headline: Preliminary Italy July CPI data due July 21, 22.

text.p: Italy's 11 sample cities will publish their preliminary July consumer price inflation data at 1530 GMT on Monday and Tuesday, July 21 and 22, national statistics institute Istat said.
Milan, Venice, Trieste, Naples and Perugia will release their CPI figures on July 21. Bologna, Florence, Bari, Palermo, Genoa and Turin will publish on July 22.
The 11 cities have a combined weighting of 75.66 percent on the national index. Istat will publish the definitive national CPI data for July at 0700 GMT on August 5.
Istat also published a calendar for the cities' monthly CPI release dates until the end of the year.
They will publish their figures on August 21 and 22, September 22 and 23, October 21 and 22, November 20 and 21 and all on December 22.
